title: Alex.Jones.Show.2008.06.17-chakra71
description:
Jason Bermas stands in while Alex is away. Jason talks with Mark Dice about his conversation with neocon Mike Reagan, former Assistant Secretary of the Treasury in the Reagan Administration Paul Craig Roberts, members of We Are Change Vancouver, and Stewart Howe of We Are Change L.A., who has filed a complaint against the neocon David Frum for assault.

Sourced from the infowars podcast (xml . nfowars . net / Alex . rss) and commercials have been cut.
